definitions.definition: Preserved in sugar or syrup by baking till it becomes translucent
definitions.example: Hot cross buns contain chopped candied fruit.

definitions.definition: To cook in, or coat with, sugar syrup.
To have sugar crystals form in or on.
definitions.example: Fruits preserved in sugar candy after a time.

definitions.definition: To be formed into candy; to solidify in a candylike form or mass.
